review.comment: I can’t recommend Gregg enough. He’s professional, communicative and the person you want by your side. Thanks to Gregg, the issue was resolved and closed in my favor before ever stepping into a courtroom. Gregg was a major blessing in my time of need. He will be for you as well.

review.comment: Gregg Gallian Firm has been more then awesome throughout my process and would recommend this firm very highly to anybody.

review.comment:
Gregg is the man you want in your corner amidst a storm. He will take the time to not only walk you through what to expect but will explain the nuances and intricacies of his strategy so you are in step throughout the entire confusing process.

The two greatest attributes that you will get with Gregg is his responsiveness and his experience. He literally texted me back over a weekend that he was vacationing in Florida with family. For experience, he worked countless (like over 100) cases with the DA's office so has rapport with the prosecutors which goes a long way in cutting through the chaff and confusion.

Gregg delivered on everything he said, at the price he said he would and was an invaluable advocate for someone who has never navigated this stressful process before. I would highly consider his office if you ever find yourself in need of a phenomenal attorney.
review.review_reply: Thank you for the kind words, Meagan.  We were so ecstatic with the outcome in your case.  Thanks again for your trust.

review.comment: I wish I could give 10 stars for Gregg's service and performance.  From day one he really made us feel like he's 150% committed to help us in any and every way possible.  His professionalism and attention to detail is unrivalled.  He really became a very trusted advisor to us and I would recommend him to everyone.  Gregg is truly a game changer when it comes to performance and relationship.  He made dealing with a lawyer actually a great experience.
review.review_reply: Thank you for your kind words and your continued friendship. The honor was all ours.

review.comment: Mr. Gallian was an excellent lawyer and helped me when I need legal representation. If I had to do it all over again I have him represent me again.
review.review_reply: Thank you for your kind words!

review.comment: I’m someone who never writes a review but I feel like this is the least I can do for Gregg as he is a phenomenal attorney. He came highly recommended by another attorney. I talked to several criminal defense attorneys and I knew right away I wanted him representing me after talking to him the first time. Dealing with accusations and having to go through mental trauma is always hard but Gregg was not only available every step of the way but was also always optimistic even when I wasn’t. In the end the decision was in our favor. I hope nobody ever needs a criminal attorney but if they do Gregg is your guy. Thank you so much.
review.review_reply: Thank you for your kind words and trust throughout the process. It is always an honor to represent great people like you.
Thank you!

review.comment: Gregg was a dedicated, communicative attorney. He eased my mind and answered all of my questions. I would definitely recommend him to anyone looking for a defense attorney!

Thanks so much!

review.comment:
Gregg Gallian and his team are "Top Notch"!  Gregg provided me with all the information I needed to begin the process of resolving my legal issue.  He was very patient and informative, and worked with me and my busy schedule to sign/submit all the needed documents.  Gregg was always prompt in his responses to my questions, and provided a status on all the filings and next steps.  He kept in constant contact with me and confirmed when the process was complete.  Gregg informed me via phone,and emails when my case was resolved, and mailed all the official documents to me once my records were updated.  So pleased with the outcome, and the process concluded much faster than I anticipated.  He made the process to update my records so easy, I now feel I should have done this years ago.

Really appreciate your expert assistance in this matter Gregg!  You will be my first recommendation to anyone!

Sincerely,
Lee Garza
review.review_reply: Lee, thank you for your kind words and, ultimately, for trusting our firm.  It means more than you know!

review.comment: I could not express with words how AMAZING and POWERFUL this lawyer is. I own to him so much peace of mind and a path of prosperity. If you are in similar situation as I was, do not hesitate to get under Gregg's umbrella legal protection. Straight forward guy, he calls it for what it is. Be honest to him and you will get 100 % all possible available legal BEST results. Five stars is not enough! That is all I can say...
